 Ma stm, what is it?   It's the newest section of our website that lets you:   Manage  your subscription  to  Society in Motion  newsletter, as well as your subscriptions to SMS messages or email alerts for métro service disruptions;   Enjoy  direct access to timetable information for your favourite bus lines .   With  ma stm , a full view of your profile is only a few clicks away!   Create your account     Ouvrir la section:  If you already subscribe to SMS messages and email métro service alerts and/or our newsletter     If you already subscribe to SMS messages and email métro service alerts and/or our newsletter, when you first log,  you must first create a  ma stm  account  in order to edit the information related to your profile. We suggest that you create your account using the same email address, as your preferences have already been saved and linked to that email address. You’ll only need to add your preferred transit trips!   Close       Ouvrir la section:  If you do not already subscribe     If you do not already subscribe to SMS messages or email métro service alerts and/or our newsletter, you must first create a  ma stm  account. Then you can add your preferences from the Trips and Newsletters sections on that page. Under the Preferences tab, you can also choose the bus lines you most frequently use for a quick access to their respective timetables.   Close     Create your account   Upcoming   Ma stm  is a project that will grow and evolve as we will gradually add new functions. For example:   Information in real time with the arrival of iBUS.
